thread.title: Gary
thread.title_full: NorthShore Care Supply reviewed by Gary

author: Gary
title: Gary
text:
I decided to try some of these after reading other reviews as I was looking for something to replace a brand I used to buy which had been modified by the manufacturer to cut costs but cheapened the product to where it wasn't worth the price anymore.
I don't know how previous reviewers could rate these things the way they have about wearing to work, tighter fit and so forth.
In my opinion, these briefs should not be suggested for the ambulatory patient. They are quite large, the material of the pant itself will not hold the garment close leaving the large pad to bunch up between your legs and make it virtually impossible to wear them under regular pants. Not only that, they cost about 50% more than competitors products.
